author: Michael Dolan
comment: It might have been given five stars as I can install the app on my mobile and see the information which is great but when I try to install it on to the Huawai smart watch on android 2.0 all it seems to do is try to install on the watch and won't finish the installation. There is plenty of room on the watch and is fully charged. This was an app I was looking for my watch but I guess I won't know how it is on my watch now. Anyone any answers to what's going on.

author: Daevid Vincent
comment: Does NOT install on Moto 360 2nd Gen with AW2.0. I can install the app on my phone and see the information, but when I try to install it on the actual watch, it doesn't finish the installation and errors out. There is plenty of room on the watch and is fully charged. Bummer, looked like a good one... Uninstalling as it's useless (at the moment). Hopefully the developer fixes this.

reply.author: Brave the Skies
reply.content: moto 360 2 does not have gps, its only an app for showing devices gps info not for getting it from the phone.

author: Andy Hood
comment: Handy utility, still not quite sure what the 0/0/2 at the bottom of the status screen means.. in view/in use/something else?  Sadly the Marshmallow update seems to have seriously compromised the GPS performance on the Sony SW3 with now frequent losses of lock and much larger inaccuracies.

author: xen doola
comment: Works flawlessly on LG Watch Urbane 2 LTE! I fire it up before tracking my runs with Endomondo. Can't say enough good things about this app. Thank you!!!!!
title: Absolutely necessity for runners!!

author: Dafydd Lawrence
comment: Despite what the description states this does work on the 360 sport. The issue is just some truncation of the text due to the round face on the 360. Otherwise simple tool for testing the in-built gps.
title: Moto 360 sport

author: Brad Falch
comment: I had the same problem as another reviewer: I couldn't get GPS working on my watch until I tried this app.
title: Works on Moto 360 Sport

author: Anthony Mancini
comment: Was unable to acquire GPS on my moto 360 sport, this app seemed to have resolved it.
title: Fixed my GPS issues

author: Hank Barta
comment: I'm giving it 3 stars. It does not work on the Polar M600 but I do appreciate the developer giving this a try.

reply.author: Brave the Skies
reply.content: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.trackwear.gnss try my the wear 2.0 gps app

author: felix pinto
comment: No issues locking on after using this. Not really sure how it works tho.
title: Works well on my SW3.

author: Milen Radanov
comment: Прави това, за което е направена програмата. Доволен съм много.
title: Страхотно приложение

author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
comment: Needs fixing though due to round shape
title: Works OK on moto 360 sport

author: James K
comment: Must have app if you have a SW3

author: Vikthor Campos
comment: I can't see the app in my Smart watch 3 :-(

author: Archil Lelashvili
comment: Helped with moto 360 sport.

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: Nice and useful

author: Kai Fong Kelvin Tan
comment: This is a fabulous tool to get a GPS lock on my Sony Smartwatch 3 BEFORE starting running apps such as Runkeeper. 6 stars!!

author: Manea Alexandru
comment: I don't undestend what is with all this number and colors from the map.... 5 star if somebody can explein me :)

reply.author: Brave the Skies
reply.content: Numbers are satellite id numbers and the colours represent the strength of the signal from that satellite. Just the same as on the list screen, but there the bar changes length as well to reflect signal.

author: Richard Long Jr
comment: App works on the phone, however does not show on the Zen Watch 1.
title: Does not work with a Zen Watch

author: Cougar Sanborn
comment: App runs on Huawei Watch 2 but data fields are blank. Other GPS apps do work on watch.   (I get the same result from the GNSS app, do don't bother. This watch has GPS, not GNSS)

author: Masud Rana
comment: Usefull apps
title: Nice
